sn46.30:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sumbhesu viharati setakam nama sumbhanam nigamo.
sn46.30:1.2: Atha kho ayasma udayi yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma udayi bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn46.30:2.2: Yava bahukatanca me, bhante, bhagavati pemanca garavo ca hiri ca ottappanca.
sn46.30:2.3: Ahanhi, bhante, pubbe agarikabhuto samano abahukato ahosim dhammena abahukato sanghena.
sn46.30:2.4: So khvaham bhagavati pemanca garavanca hirinca ottappanca sampassamano agarasma anagariyam pabbajito.
sn46.30:2.6: ‘iti rupam, iti rupassa samudayo, iti rupassa atthangamo;
sn46.30:2.10: iti vinnanam, iti vinnanassa samudayo, iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti.
sn46.30:3.1: So khvaham, bhante, sunnagaragato imesam pancupadanakkhandhanam ukkujjavakujjam samparivattento ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam abbhannasim, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yathabhutam abbhannasim, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yathabhutam abbhannasim, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam abbhannasim.
sn46.30:3.2: Dhammo ca me, bhante, abhisamito, maggo ca me patiladdho;
sn46.30:3.3: yo me bhavito bahulikato tatha tatha viharantam tathattaya upanessati yathaham:
sn46.30:3.4: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanissami.
sn46.30:4.1: Satisambojjhango me, bhante, patiladdho, yo me bhavito bahulikato tatha tatha viharantam tathattaya upanessati yathaham:
sn46.30:4.2: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanissami …pe…
sn46.30:4.3: upekkhasambojjhango me, bhante, patiladdho, yo me bhavito bahulikato tatha tatha viharantam tathattaya upanessati yathaham:
sn46.30:4.4: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanissami.
sn46.30:4.5: Ayam kho me, bhante, maggo patiladdho, yo me bhavito bahulikato tatha tatha viharantam tathattaya upanessati yathaham:
sn46.30:4.6: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanissami”ti.
sn46.30:5.2: Eso hi te, udayi, maggo patiladdho, yo te bhavito bahulikato tatha tatha viharantam tathattaya upanessati yatha tvam:
sn46.30:5.3: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanissasi”ti.
